name: Static Ops
description:
4/8/17
-Better interaction detection
-Improved readability

-Updated March-

2 Players work together as Spy and Operator to infiltrate the base, crack the code, and make off with the plans.

Player 1 plays the Spy and uses the monitor and controller to navigate a house-turned-military base on a mission to acquire 3 disks to access secret plans and escape.

Player 2 plays the Operator and uses only the headphones, mouse, and code book to tune through radio frequencies and crack the code.

Combine visual information information in the house, radio transmissions, and the code book to succeed!

MAKE SURE TO DOWNLOAD THE CRYPTOSHEET.

Originally made for Global Game Jam 17

http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/static-ops

Programming: Andrew Baillie (@PIZZAPRANKS)

Design: Chris Maire (@dinosaursssssss)

Art: Colin Brown (@ColinBrown_)

Audio: Oliver Getz (@sjatrik)
